_sText:
This is outdated but functional version. Newer is sodan lab v2 ================== My first obstacles/race map created into Portal-like form. You must overcome all the obstacles created by GLaDOS before your opponents. Then, just YOU choose the end.
Contains: - 9 middle-difficulty levels - 3 types of end - settings room (gravity, ligts, movement, drugs)                    - make it harder to enemies (or, conversely, easier) - good feeling of victory over rivals
Changelog:  - sodan_lab_n > ported textures and models are removed and replaced with a similar  - sodan_lab > final stage, no improvements, just renamed  - sodan_lab_rc4 > optimalized, something that make map laggy is out (tried with 20 players),                             small improvements and bugs fix  - sodan_lab_rc3 > optimalized, private usage only And please leave comments
